1.8.8.2.0.13: Fixes lag from pokemobs in GUI, fixes the remaining server/client sync issues, Fixes solosis line, requires re-downloading the Pokecube_Resources.zip from GitHub
1.8.8.2.0.12: Improves Animation Loading support, models can be partially animated in tabula, and in the xml via presets, and have them combined
1.8.8.2.0.10: fixes the long standing sync issues with client and server which would result in teleporty pokemobs
1.8.8.2.0.9: Updates the version checker, fixes combee and charizard not loading from resource pack
1.8.8.2.0.8: fixes missing berry block textures, a pokecube dupe bug, adds configurable interaction capabilities
1.8.8.2.0.6: modified the custom trader entity, it now sells things the villager used to
1.8.8.2.0.3: fixes a crash from village buildings, fixes village buildings
1.8.8.2.0.2: fixes a crash from removing pokemobs
1.8.8.2.0.1: added forge based version checking, changed how eggs work
